Description of incident: Anyone who has shopped at Harbor Freight within the last three months (June, July, and August of 2013) may be at risk for credit or debit card fraud.  Online and in store customers were affected.  Tens of thousands of dollars were taken from between 300 and 600 member accounts.UPDATE (11/04/2013): Customers who made purchases in stores between May 6, 2013 and June 30, 2013 may have had their card account numbers, expiration dates, and card verification numbers exposed.
